Name: Rassel
Description: There was a clash between two groups of covered van workers. At one stage, they vandalized the cars and altercated with each other. Later, the police opened fire suspecting those workers as activists of student wing of Jamaat-e-Islami. Police demanded Rassel as an activist of student wing of Jamaat-e-Islami but local Jamaat-e-Islami demanded he was not an activist of jamaat-e-Islami.

Name: Abdur Rahim
Identity: Activists of student wing of Jamaat-e-Islami
Description: Three student wing of Jamaat activists were killed in police firing during a clash between police and Jamaat activists.

Name: Monirul Islam
Identity: Activists of student wing of Jamaat-e-Islami
Description: Three student wing of Jamaat activists were killed in police firing during a clash between police and Jamaat activists.

Name: Saju Islam
Identity: Activists of student wing of Jamaat-e-Islami
Description: Three student wing of Jamaat activists were killed in police firing during a clash between police and Jamaat activists.

Name: Ashaduzzaman alias Babul
Description: Major Shahed of RAB-11 said that Ashaduzzaman was killed in a gunfight with RAB on December 15, 2013. However, the family of Sumon alleged that Sumon along with Ashaduzzaman was killed in the gunfight while RAB denied the allegation of the killing of Sumon.
Sources: Prothom Alo,Kaler Kantha and Jugantor 17.12.2013, odhikar confirmed the news from a journalist the daily Amar Desh named Kawsar. Cell no. 01711956877

Name: Johirul Islam Sumon
Description: Major Shahed of RAB-11 said that Ashaduzzaman was killed in a gunfight with RAB on December 15, 2013. However, the family of Sumon alleged that Sumon along with Ashaduzzaman was killed in the gunfight while RAB denied the allegation of the killing of Sumon.
Sources: Prothom Alo,Kaler Kantha and Jugantor 17.12.2013, odhikar confirmed the news from a journalist the daily Amar Desh named Kawsar. Cell no. 01711956877

Name: Jahangir Alam
Identity: Activists of Jamaat-e-Islami and Student wing of Jamaat-e-Islami
Description: Five activists of Jamaat and student wing of Jamaat-e-Islami were shot dead in clashes with joint forces. Of them, three died in Sadar upazila while two in Debhata upazila in separate battles that ensued when the party supporters attacked the law enforcers who went to make arrests in connection with the latest spate of violence.

Name: Shafiqul Islam
Identity: Activists of Jamaat-e-Islami and Student wing of Jamaat-e-Islami
Description: Five activists of Jamaat and student wing of Jamaat-e-Islami were shot dead in clashes with joint forces. Name: Insan Ali
Identity: Activists of Jamaat-e-Islami and Student wing of Jamaat-e-Islami
Description: Three activists of Jamaat and student wing of Jamaat-e-Islami were killed in police firing while the Jamaat and student wing of Jamaat activists clashed with the police. In this incident 20 people including a woman were injured. On 17.12.13 Abdur Rahman, former UP member and activist of Jamaat who sustained injury died in a Dhaka Medical Collge Hospital. Ref: 18.12.13 Manabzamin

Name: Feroz
Identity: Activists of Jamaat-e-Islami and Student wing of Jamaat-e-Islami
Description: Three activists of Jamaat and student wing of Jamaat-e-Islami were killed in police firing while the Jamaat and student wing of Jamaat activists clashed with the police. Ref: 18.12.13 Manabzamin

Name: Abdur Rahman
Identity: Former UP member and activist of Jamaat

Name: Sohag
Description: On 18 December 2013, an alleged criminal was killed in a crossfire with police at Aftabnagar area in Badda, Dhaka.

Name: Md Al Mahmud
Description: Two robbers were killed in a gunfight with police in Baniagati area under Kamarkand Upazila of Sirajganj District on 24 December 2013.

Name: Mansur Ali
Description: Two robbers were killed in a gunfight with police in Baniagati area under Kamarkand Upazila of Sirajganj District on 24 December 2013.

Name: Hafizul Islam Dalal
Description: Rickshaw van puller Hafizul Islam Dalal, died on the spot after being hit with a bullet during a clash between Jamaat and student wing of Jamaat activists and the joint forces. The clash had began when joint forces went there to clear a stretch and the Jamaat activists had chased the joint forces members.

Name: Mansur Ahmed
Identity: An activist of student wing of jamaat-e-Islami and LL.B student of Uttara University
Description: Mansur Ahmed hailed from Munshirhat, Chandpur Sadar, was shot dead by police at Malibagh, Dhaka in a 'road march for democracy'.

Name: Mohammad Jihad
Identity: Activist of youth wing of BNP
Description:
Mohammad Jihad, an activist of youth wing of BNP hailed from Nobogram, Ullapara, Sirajganj was shot dead by police at Malibagh, Dhaka in March for Democracy movement led by
BNP and its 18-Party Alliance and its meeting at Naya Paltan on December 29, 2013 in protest of election on January 5, 2014

Name: Anarul Islam
Description: A Union Parishad Chairman, who allegedly had direct links with the recent violence in Satkhira, was killed in a "gunfight"  between the joint forces and Jamaat-Shibir activists at Vadra of Satkhira Sadar upazila. On 30 December, 2013 the joint forces were patrolling the Vadra area of Kushkhali UP around 12:30 pm when some 250 Jamaat-Shibir activists attacked the law enforcers with brickbats and crude bombs. At one stage, the attackers opened fire on lawmen, forcing the law enforcers to retaliate with gunshots. As the Jamaat-Shibir men retreated after around an hour, law enforcers found bullet-hit Anarul lying near a pond in the area.

Name: Arman Ali
Description: An alleged robber was killed in a 'gunfight' with police at Akkelpur in Jaipurhat on December 31, 2013. The deceased was identified as Arman Ali (40), son of the late Akkas Ali of village Puran Gopinathpur under Akkelpur. Md Hamidul Alam, Police Super of Jaipurhat, said on information that a group of robbers, led by Arman Ali, was planning robbery at Puran Gopinathpur, a police team rushed there. But as the lawmen reached there at around 2.30 pm, the robbers fired gunshots targeting police.

Name: Abdul Jobbar
Identity: Jamaat ameer (chief) of ward no. 9 of Amjhupi Union Parishad, Kushtia
Description: A ward-level Jamaat-e-Islami leader was killed in a gunfight between law enforcers and Jamaat-Shibir men in Sadar upazila on December 31, 2013. AKM Nahidul Islam, Superintendent of Police (SP) in Meherpur, said a team of joint forces arrested Jabbar from his residence at Hijuli village on December 30, 2013 in connection with recent violence unleashed by Jamaat and its student wing Islami Chhatra Shibir in the district. During the interrogation, Jabbar disclosed the identity of the party men in the area, and a cache of arms possessed by them, the SP said. Shibir cadres led by Abdul Matin, Khulna divisional coordinator of Jamaat, were scheduled to meet him in the village on the night, the SP said quoting Jabbar. Following the confessional statement, a team of joint forces conducted a raid in the village around 2:00 am on 31 December, 2013. Sensing the presence of the law enforcers, Jamaat-Shibir men opened fire on the joint forces, while the law enforcers fired gunshots in response. At one stage, Jabbar who was staying with the team during the raids, jumped out of the police van to flee the scene, and caught in the line of fire.

Name: Kismot Ali
Description: SI Mominur Rahman and Constable  Mahabub of Digholiya Police Station ,Choukidar (village watchman) Mokbul went to Kismot's house at about 9.30 pm on 30 December, 2013. They detained Kismot and took him to Union Parishad.From there he was taken to a Pharmacy and later moved to Upazila Health Complex. At Upazila Health Complex, he was declared dead. Nazma Begum, wife of Kismot alleged that, police beat up Kismot by rifle  in the time of taking him.She alleged that, police is liable for the death of her husband.

Name: Nasir Uddin
Description: On 4 November 2013, in a clash between police, Awami League and BNP,police opened fire which caused Nasir Uddin  dead .

Name: Kalu
Description: Three alleged pirates were killed in a gunfight with police. Police got information that Kalu was staying with his associates near Alamin fishery project near Bhuiyarhat of Subarnachar upazila and planning a piracy in Meghna River. As Kalu and his associates sensed the presence of the police, they opened fire at the police who also retaliated with firing.

Name: Ripon
Description: Three alleged pirates were killed in a gunfight with police. Police got information that Kalu was staying with his associates near Alamin fishery project near Bhuiyarhat of Subarnachar upazila and planning a piracy in Meghna River. As Kalu and his associates sensed the presence of the police, they opened fire at the police who also retaliated with firing.

Name: Rubel
Description: Three alleged pirates were killed in a gunfight with police. Police got information that Kalu was staying with his associates near Alamin fishery project near Bhuiyarhat of Subarnachar upazila and planning a piracy in Meghna River. As Kalu and his associates sensed the presence of the police, they opened fire at the police who also retaliated with firing.

Name: Jakir Sadik
Description: ASI Masudur Rahman, In Charge of Tekala Police Camp of Doulotpur Police Station of Kushtia arrested Jakir Sadik from his home and took him to the Doulotpur Police Station on 13 November 2013. On the same day at about 11 pm at night, the family of the victim came to know that, he was killed. The family claimed that, Jakir Sadik died in the police custody due to  torture.
Sources: Human Rights Defender of Kushtia Hasan Ali, Mothly Report of November 2013

Name: Siraj Khan
Description: Siraj Khan was allegedly beaten to death by SI Asad, Ramzan Ali, Aminul and ASI Azad, Harun,Jewel. On 26 November 2013 Siraj Khan with five others were playing cards. At that time, the aformentioned police officers came to the place and said that they were  gambling. Then the officers chased them. TThe police detained Siraj and beat him up . Later local people chased the police team. The police officers fled from the place. On the other hand, Siraj was declared dead by the doctors after he was taken to the Upazila Health Complex.
Actions Taken: SI Asad, Ramzan Ali, Aminul and ASI Azad, Harun,Jewel were closed from the Police Station

Name: Delwar Hossain
Identity: Activist of student wing of BNP
Description: Two student wing of BNP activists were injured as police fired tear shells and rubber bullets to the BNP led 18 party alliance procession. In this incident Delwar, an activist of student wing of BNP was killed after he received bullet .

Name: Yusuf Ali
Identity: Organizing Secretary of youth wing of BNP of 21 No. ward of Bogra
Description: In a clash with police Yusuf Ali, Organizing Secretary of youth wing of BNP of 21 No. ward of Bogra was shot to death  by police  during  the country wide obstruction.

Name: Babul Mia
Identity: A rickshawpuller and an activist of BNP Sromik Dol
Description: On 26 November in the blockade, it is alleged that the blockaders vandalized and set fire on the vehicles at Doulotganj bazaar in Laksam upazila of Comilla. In this incident police indiscriminately opened fire where an activist of BNP Sromik Dol who is also a rickshawpuller died.

Name: Israil
Identity: Activist of student wing of Jamaat e Islami
Description: In the first day of 72 hours of obstruction(Oborohd) of 18 party alliance, one activist of Jamaat-e-Islam shot to death by police firing.

Name: Badsha Mia
Identity: Garment worker of GMS Composit Knitting
Description: Workers of GMS Composit Knitting staged a demonstration and rampage through the workplace demanding arrest of an official, who allegedly assaulted a female worker. During that demonstration suddenly police started to charge them with rubber bullets and tear gus. In that incident those  Badsha & Ruma got shot and killed on the spot.

Name: Ruma
Identity: Garment worker of GMS Composit Knitting

Name: Wahed
Description: A group of dacoits were getting preparations to conduct a robbery in Namajpur area. Police got the information and went there. Later at Cholna Bridge those dacoits opened fire from the troller targeting the police and the police also opened fire in a reply. In the gunfight, the leader of the dacoits group Wahed was killed by the police.

Name: Rofiqul Islam
Identity: An activist of student wing of Jamaat-e-Islami
Description: Police opened fire in a procession of Jamaat-e-Islami and student wing of Jamaat-e-Islami while the activist of  Jamaat-e-Islami tried to attack ta puja-mondop which caused Rafiqul dead.

Name: Arif
Identity: An activist of youth wing of BNP
Description: The 18 party alliance led by BNP was carried out a programme schedule on 25 October 2013 related to ongoing political situation for 10th parliamentary elections. On 25 October 2013 at Faridganj of Chandpur, there was a clash among BNP, Jamaat and police. In this situation police opened 200 rounds of bullet , rubber bullets and tear shells. At that time, three people were shot dead by police.

Name: Jahangir
Identity: An activist of youth wing of BNP
Description: The 18 party alliance led by BNP was carried out a programme schedule on 25 October 2013 related to ongoing political situation for 10th parliamentary elections. On 25 October 2013 at Faridganj of Chandpur, there was a clash among BNP, Jamaat and police. In this situation police opened 200 rounds of bullet , rubber bullets and tear shells. At that time, three people were shot dead by police.

Name: Abedin Sharif
Identity: An activist of student wing of BNP
Description: The 18 party alliance led by BNP was carried out a programme schedule on 25 October 2013 related to ongoing political situation for 10th parliamentary elections. On 25 October 2013 at Faridganj of Chandpur, there was a clash among BNP, Jamaat and police. In this situation police opened 200 rounds of bullet , rubber bullets and tear shells. At that time, three people were shot dead by police.

Name: Saiful Islam Badsha
Identity: Joint Convenor of the Voluntary wing of BNP
Description: Two of the activists  of BNP were shot dead by police-BGB at Chokoria in Cox's Bazar in a procession.

Name: Mohammad Mizan
Identity: Activist of youth wing of BNP
Description: Two of the activists  of BNP were shot dead by police-BGB at Chokoria in Cox's Bazar in a procession.

Name: Moslem Uddin
Identity: An activist of student wing of Jamaat-e-Islami
Description: In a clash between police and BNP-Jamaat, one Moslem Uddin got bullet wounded and later died at Rangpur Medical College Hospital.

Name: Rashedul Islam
Identity: Finance Secretary of student wing of Jamaat-e-Islami
Description: Rashedul Islam (23) was killed in a clash with the police and the Rapid Action Battalion at Kajla. The leader and several people became injured in other places across the country in violence that took place on 26 October 2013 before the 60-hour countrywide general strike.

Name: Mortoza Hossain Rana
Description: Two alleged forest robbers were killed in a 'shootout' with RAB in Shelargang area of Sundarban under Mongla upazila on 30 October 2013.A team of elite force conducted a drive in Sundarban around 7.50 am as part of their regular drive against the forest robbers. When the RAB members reached Shelargang area under Changpai forest range, the forest robbers opened fire targeting the law enforcers, forcing them to retaliate that triggered a gun battle. The two robbers were caught in the line of fire and died on the spot.

Name: Mosharof Hossain
Description: Two alleged forest robbers were killed in a 'shootout' with RAB in Shelargang area of Sundarban under Mongla upazila on 30 October 2013.A team of elite force conducted a drive in Sundarban around 7.50 am as part of their regular drive against the forest robbers. When the RAB members reached Shelargang area under Changpai forest range, the forest robbers opened fire targeting the law enforcers, forcing them to retaliate that triggered a gun battle. The two robbers were caught in the line of fire and died on the spot.

Name: Abu Ahmed
Description: In a clash between police and Jamaat-e-Islami, police shot to death four activists of Jamaat-e-Islami.

Name: Tajul Islam
Description: In a clash between police and Jamaat-e-Islami, police shot to death four activists of Jamaat-e-Islami.

Name: Mohammad Parvez
Description: In a clash between police and Jamaat-e-Islami, police shot to death four activists of Jamaat-e-Islami.

Name: Azizur Rahman
Description: In a clash between police and Jamaat-e-Islami, police shot to death four activists of Jamaat-e-Islami.

Name: Saiful Islam Mithu
Identity: Final year student of Accountings of honurs at Tejgaon College
Description: Police detained Saiful Ahmed Mithu on September 4, 2013 and took him to the Shahjahanpur Police Station. The family of the victim claimed that, he was tortured there and died.  However, police claimed that  he died at Dhaka medical College Hospital due to stroke.

Name: Mohammad Boshir
Description: Selim, Sub-Inspector of Munshiganj Sadar Police Station tortured Boshir and as a result he died.

Name: Fazlur Rahman Fazu
Identity: A regional leader of ultra left Gano Mukti Fauz
Description: A regional leader of ultra-left Gano Mukti Fauz was killed in an 'encounter' with police in Khuksa upazila of Kushtia on September 22, 2013. According to police sources, Fazu and his operatives were holding a 'clandestine' meeting near the Uthuli Bridge in the upazila. Hearing the news at about 4:00 am, Khuksha police went to the spot. Sensing the presence of the police, the outlaws opened fire prompting the law enforcers to return fire that triggered an encounter.

Name: Emran
Description: Two alleged pirates were killed in a gunfight with police at hatiya upazila in Noakhali.

Name: Rubel Hossain
Identity: Owner of Mohini Garments, Baghmara, Rajshahi
Description: Police members of Taherpur Municipality Police Barrack used to harass the motorcycle riders for bribe in front of Mohini Garments. When people reducing their visit to the market because of the police harassment, the shop owners of the garments went to the police barrack to talk about it. At one stage of the talking police opened fire at them, where Rubel got shot and died.

Name: Azhar Uddin
Location: Nalitabari Police Station, Nalitabri upazila, Sherpur.
Description: Police members of Nalitabari Police Station arrested Azhar on July 24, suspecting him to be involved in a murder case. He was taken into remand and kept in Nalitabari Police Station, where he was reportedly given electric shocks. Family alleged that he was tortured to death at police custody.
Sources: Daily Star / Amader Somoy / Bangladesh Protidin 03.08.2013

Name: Billal Hossain
Description: Billal was killed in a shootout with the police. Police said a patrol team of Darshana Police Camp challenged a group of miscreants when they were seen to have gathered in a field in the area. The miscreants fired rounds of bullet targeting the law enforcers, which triggered a gunfight. After gunfight, police found Billal's bullet hit  body.

Name: Solayman Hossain
Identity: An activist of Jamaaat e Islami
Description: During the hartal period on 13 August 2013 police opened fire in a clash at Rajnagar main road of Meherpur. As a result, an activist of jamaat e islami shot tand  wounded. He was admitted to the Rajshahi Islami Bank Medical College Hospital, where doctor declared him dead.

Name: Unidentified
Location: Manpura upazila in the Mehgna river of Bhola
Description: At least five pirates were critically injured and may have succumbed to their injuries, during a  six-hour gunfight with the police in Manpura upazila of Bhola on 25 August 2013. The incident occurred at the Burir Don area near the Meghna estuary in Manpura.

Name: Unidentified
Location: Manpura upazila in the Mehgna river of Bhola
Description: At least five pirates were critically injured and may have succumbed to their injuries, during a  six-hour gunfight with the police in Manpura upazila of Bhola on 25 August 2013. The incident occurred at the Burir Don area near the Meghna estuary in Manpura.

Name: Unidentified
Location: Manpura upazila in the Mehgna river of Bhola
Description: At least five pirates were critically injured and may have succumbed to their injuries, during a  six-hour gunfight with the police in Manpura upazila of Bhola on 25 August 2013. The incident occurred at the Burir Don area near the Meghna estuary in Manpura.

Name: Unidentified
Location: Manpura upazila in the Mehgna river of Bhola
Description: At least five pirates were critically injured and may have succumbed to their injuries, during a  six-hour gunfight with the police in Manpura upazila of Bhola on 25 August 2013. The incident occurred at the Burir Don area near the Meghna estuary in Manpura.

Name: Unidentified
Location: Manpura upazila in the Mehgna river of Bhola
Description: At least five pirates were critically injured and may have succumbed to their injuries, during a  six-hour gunfight with the police in Manpura upazila of Bhola on 25 August 2013. The incident occurred at the Burir Don area near the Meghna estuary in Manpura.

Name: Yunus
Identity: A leader of a robber's gang
Description: A leader of a robber's gang was killed in a gunfight with police at Hatiya upazila in Noakhali on 30 August 2013. Police said the deceased Yunus was shot dead around 1 am.

Name: Yasin Bepari
Description: Detective Branch of Police carried out an  operation to arrest Yasin . When Yasin come to know the  presence of the police, Yasine & his accomplices started firing at the police forcing  police to retaliate.  After the gunfight  Yasin found dead.

Name: Riaz alias Dalim
Description: RAB 8 official  carried out an operation in the Sundarbans. During the operation RAB members got engaged in a gun fight with a rival criminal group. That incident left 2 of the  alleged criminals dead.

Name: Mohammad Mahadi
Description: Mohammad Mahadi was killed in a crossfire, which took place between Pallabi Police and alleged criminals

Name: Md. Sabuj Mia
Description: Those two miscreants rent a microbus from Dhaka International Airport to go to Dhaka-Mawa highway. When they reached there, they dropped the driver and started driving the microbus.. As there was a check post of RAB-10 at Nazirabag area, RAB members tried to stop the microbus for checking. According to RAB ,suddenly the criminals  opened fire at the RAB official which forcing  RAB to retaliate. After the gunfight Sabuj and Sagor found dead.

Name: H M Jahid Siddiq Tareq
Identity: Joint Secretary of Dhaka Metropolitan AL (North) and Alleged Criminal
Description: Tareq and his associate Shah Alam got killed by RAB members in a crossfire.

Name: Rashed Parvez
Description: Rashed got killed in crossfire with the RAB members, it is alleged that he along with his several associates kidnapped a 14 years old son of a an army sergeant.

Name: Nurul Islam
Description: A Jamaat activist was killed and four others were injured in a clash between student wing of Jamaat - E - Islami and law enforcers

Name: Ziaur Rahman
Description: Latifur Rahman, ameer of city unit Jamaat alleged, an activist named Ziaur Rahman had also been killed in the BGB firing. He was a 1st year student of HSC of Krishna Gobinda College, succumbed to his injuries while he was being taken to Rajshahi Medical College & Hospital.

Name: Arifuzzaman
Identity: activists of Jamaat-e-Islami and student wing of Jamaat-e-Islami
Description: Two Jamaat Islami & student wing of Jamat -E + Islami were killed between police and Jamaat- activists in Pawkhai Hazampara area Police opened fire to remove the road blockade set up by  activists of Jamaat-E-Islami

Name: Ruhul Amin Gazi
Identity: activists of Jamaat-e-Islami and student wing of Jamaat-e-Islami
Description: Two Jamaat Islami & student wing of Jamat -E + Islami were killed between police and Jamaat- activists in Pawkhai Hazampara area Police opened fire to remove the road blockade set up by  activists of Jamaat-E-Islami

Name: Unidentified
Description: When police petrol team of Sreepur Police Station was returning from duty around 15 miscreants hold their way for robbery. When they were attacking the police officers , police counter fired. That incident left one of the robber dead.

Name: Shamim Sarkar
Location: Tannery Industry Police Barrack, Hemayetpur, Savar. Dhaka
Description: Police officers from Savar Police Station arrested Shamim and took him to the Tannery Industry Police Barrack. SI Imdad and ASI Akidul demanded 5 lac taka from him. Police tortured him at the barrack the whole night. When he died police took his dead body to the Mitford Hospital .
Actions Taken: Departmental Inquary is going on.

Name: Razu
Location: Infront  of Ramna Chinese Restaurant, Ramna, Dhaka
Description: Police of Ramna Police Station shot Razu to death in a crossfire.
Sources: Prothom Alo / Inqilab / Manabzamin / Naya Diganta  10.06.2013

Name: Waris Ali
Description: Ansar members of Chhatak paper Mills caught Waris red handed at the time of stealing fish from a pond of the mills. After severly beating him the Ansar members handed him over to the Chhatak police station branding him a robber. Police took Waris  to Osmani Medical College  &Hospital in a critical condition, where the duty doctors declared him dead.

Name: Shah Alam Sarder
Identity: Worker of Crescent Jute Mill, Khulna
Location: Infront of Crescent Bazar Community center
Description: Shah Alam was beaten to death by RAB-06 members, when Shah Alam along with 20/25 people brought a procession during election. Locals described that RAB officials beat those processioners and arrested 10 persons. Shah Alam ran away from there and moving towards his home . After some time he fall sick and was taken to health centre of the mill , Khalishpur Meidical Centre and then Gazi Medical College Hospital. Duty doctors declared him dead.

Name: Mahbub alias Saijja
Identity: Chief of miscreants group called Saijja Bahini
Description: Those three alleged pirates from the Sundarbans were killed in a gun battle with Members of Rapid Action Battalion-08.

Name: Amjad
Identity: Chief of miscreants group called Amjaz Bahini

Name: Badal
Location: Mognama Ghat, Pekua Upazila, Cox's Bazar.
Description: Badal was killed in a gun fight with Police. Police claimed that he was a leader of a robber group.

Name: Hasmot Ali Bhutto
Description: S I Selim from Bagha Police Station, Rajshahi arrested Hasmot Ali for taking drugs and tortured him at the police station. When he was sent to the jail, he fell sick and died. When his body was returned to his family, they seen lots of marks of injuries in his body.  His  family claimed that he was tortured to death. by police
Sources: Naya Diganto 05.07.2013 and Bagha HRD Selim Bhandari (01713762981)

Name: Iqbal Hossain
Description: On May 02, 2013 RAB membes arrested Iqbal from Aruapara graveyard. As he became sick RAB menbers took him to Kushtia General Hospital, there duty doctor declared him dead. His familty claimed that  he was tortured to death  while in custody The RMO of the hospital wrote in a note that sign of beating found in the body of the deceased.

Name: Delwar Hossain
Description: On May 20, 2013 Delwar got killed in a crossfire. Police said Delwar with his associates were preparing for docoity. As police tried to arrest them, they opened fire at police and retaliated .

Name: Unidentified
Identity: Members of Hefazat e Islam, students and ordinary people
Description: At least 61 people were killed by the law enforcement agencies ( Police and Armed Police Battalion, RAB, BGB) centering around Hefazat  Islam  rally and protest on May 05 and 06 2013.

Name: Nizamuddin
Identity: Secretary of youth wing of BNP, Block-2, Arsadnagar, Tongi
Description: On May 21, 2013 Tongi Police conducted an arrest operation. During that operation police beat up Nizamuddin and threw him from the police van, which caused him to death.

Name: Johirul Islam
Description: On May 22, 2013 RAB-1 petrol team was running a check post at Maskat Plaza Road of Uttara, at mid night a car just broke the signal and run away. Then RAB chased the car till the end of  the road . Suddenly passengers of that car started fire at RAB and  RAB also fired back in self defence. That incident resulted two  persons dead.

Name: Shaju Akando
Identity: Driver of a Satellite TV (Channel I ) channels car
Description: On May 22, 2013 RAB-1 petrol team was running a check post at Maskat Plaza Road of Uttara, at mid night a car just broke the signal and run away. Then RAB chased the car till the end of  the road . Suddenly passengers of that car started fire at RAB and  RAB also fired back in self defence. That incident resulted two  persons dead.

Name: Rana
Location: Kasugari petrol camp of Pachbibi, Jaipurhat
Description: BGB members shot and killed those two drug dealers as they breached BGB check post signal.

Name: Mohidul
Location: Kasugari petrol camp of Pachbibi, Jaipurhat
Description: BGB members shot and killed those two drug dealers as they breached BGB check post signal.

Name: Unidentified
Description: The alleged mugger  was killed  in a gunfight by police  on May 25, 2013 when several police members were running a petrol duty in plain cloths, When the police chessed the muggers hey started firing at the police. Police also fired back in self defense, which left one of the muggers killed.

Name: Shamim Reza
Description: Shamim was arrested in the alligation of involvment in a murder case. He was kept at the roof top of police quarter and continuously tortured. The family claimed that Shamim was tortured to death as the family failed to pay the money demanded by the police.
Actions Taken: Narayanganj ASP and two other police officers were withdrown on May 26, 2013 as the departmental probe had found Shamim Reza tortured before his death in custody.

Name: Mohammad Mamun
Description: Hefajat men had fought pitched battles with law enforcement agencies where three people were shot dead by police-RAB-BGB.

Name: Jashim Uddin
Description: Hefajat men had fought pitched battles with law enforcement agencies where three people were shot dead by police-RAB-BGB.

Name: Mohammad Noman
Description: Hefajat men had fought pitched battles with law enforcement agencies where three people were shot dead by police-RAB-BGB.

Name: Ebadat Ali
Description: Ebadat Ali, an egg trader was shot  dead by police firing when the police clashed with JStudent wing of Jamaat -e _ Islami activists.

Name: Rubel Hassan alias Hasan
Description: On April 02, 2013 when Police of Rampura police station was pursuing a snatcher, they opened fire targeting police.  Then police also opened fire at them and Rubel Hasan got killed falling in the middle of that gunfight.

Name: Sahidul Islam
Description: On April 05, 2013 activists of AL and Hefazat-e-Islami engaged into a clash. One of the activists of AL got killed as police shot fire to them.

Name: Samiul Islam
Description: Several dacoits tried to hold some police officers on there way and tried to snatch their arms, then police fired at them and Samiul was gunned killed.

Name: Monsur Gazi
Location: Gazipara, Checuri village, Dumuria Upazila, Khulna
Description: Monsur Gazi got shot by the police fire when the activists of Jamaat-e-Islami and it's student wing activists blocked the way with tree and attacked the police camp.

Name: Selim Hawladar
Identity: Alleged Forest robber and suspected to be the member of Mortuza Bahini
Location: Mrigamari Canal area, Mongla East Sunderban, Bagherhat.
Description: Those three alleged robbers were killed in a gunfight when Rapid Action Battalion (RAB-8)  members raided on that area.

Name: Unidentified
Identity: Alleged Forest robber and suspected to be the member of Mortuza Bahini
Location: Mrigamari Canal area, Mongla East Sunderban, Bagherhat.
Description: Those three alleged robbers were killed in a gunfight when Rapid Action Battalion (RAB-8)  members raided on that area.

Name: Unidentified
Identity: Alleged Forest robber and suspected to be the member of Mortuza Bahini
Location: Mrigamari Canal area, Mongla East Sunderban, Bagherhat.
Description: Those three alleged robbers were killed in a gunfight when Rapid Action Battalion (RAB-8)  members raided on that area.

Name: Nurul Islam Nuri
Identity: Joint Secretary of Jagati Union, Sadar Upazila  BNP, Kushtia
Description: On April 25, 2013 Nurul Islam was abducted by some plain clothed person, who identified themselves as DB officials. Later on on April 26, 2013 his body was found at the nearby road of Horra. Family claimed  that DB officials killed him with the involvement of local AL leaders.

Name: Asghar Ali
Description: A 12-year-old boy, Ashgar Ali Limon, was killed reportedly in police firing during fierce clashes between law enforcers and student wing of Jamaat. A bullet hit him in the face causing his death.

Name: Korban Ali
Description: Korban Ali, an electrician had been killed by RAB-11 and 20 people were injured

Name: Shahidul Islam
Description: Three people had shot dead in a clash between Police-BGB and Jamaat-Shibir at Satkania on March 2, 2013. The activists of Jamaat were obstructed the Chittagong-Cox's Bazar highway from February 28, 2013.On March 2 a large convoy of police force tried to evict the obstruction. The protesters through brick bats to the police and police indiscriminately opened fire.

Name: Abu Taher
Description: Three people had shot dead in a clash between Police-BGB and Jamaat-Shibir at Satkania on March 2, 2013. The activists of Jamaat were obstructed the Chittagong-Cox's Bazar highway from February 28, 2013.On March 2 a large convoy of police force tried to evict the obstruction. The protesters through brick bats to the police and police indiscriminately opened fire.

Name: Osman Goni
Description: Three people had shot dead in a clash between Police-BGB and Jamaat-Shibir at Satkania on March 2, 2013. The activists of Jamaat were obstructed the Chittagong-Cox's Bazar highway from February 28, 2013.On March 2 a large convoy of police force tried to evict the obstruction. The protesters through brick bats to the police and police indiscriminately opened fire.

Name: Abdur Razzak Apon
Description: On March 2, 2013 Abdur Razzak Apon was shot dead by Police-BGB while Jamaat-student wing of Jamaat  brought out a procession from Razarhat that was headed to Jhaldaka while police tried to stop the procession.At that time, section 144 was imposed in Jhaldaka.At one stage in the clash Police-BGB opened fire.

Name: Titu
Description: A rumor was spread by the mosques through megaphones that the face of Sayedee was seen at moon after the judgment of death penalty of Sayedee. It was also announced that it was the duty of every Muslims to protect Sayedee by the sake of religion. As a result, thousands of people came out from the house led by Jamaat and started demonstration. Later, 13 people including three women were killed in a fight between police and Jamaat-Student wing of Jamaat activists at different places of the district.

Description: A rumor was spread by the mosques through megaphones that the face of Sayedee was seen at moon after the judgment of death penalty of Sayedee. Description: Mahbubur Rahman, an activist of Jamaat and Sohag, a student of class five, were shot dead by BGB. BGB men opened fire when  pickets refused to clear a highway and hurled stones at them. Local administration imposed section 144 there.

The local administration has imposed section 144 of the Code of Criminal Procedure,1898.

Identity: Activists of student wing of Jamaat-e-Islami
Description: Mahfuz Hossain was killed  by police in fierce clashes at Sreekola intersection on Pabna-Bogra road under Ullapara upazila in the district.Local administration imposed section 144 on some places to avoid further trouble.

Name: Shah Alam Khokon
Location: Shot wounded at Naya Paltan On March 6, 2013 and died at Dhaka Medical College Hospital on March 7, 2013
Description: On 7.3.13 Rizvhi Ahmed, Joint Secretary General of BNP stated that Shah Alam Khokon, an activist of BNP died was shot and wounded by police.  Later he died at Dhaka Medical College Hospital. It is to be noted that  police fired bullets to break up the protests of the city unit BNP which was holding at Naya Paltan as part of the partys countrywide programmes in protest  of attacks, arrests and filing false cases against party leaders and activists.

Name: Kanchan
Description: On March 4, 2013  in a clash between police and robbers  a robber named Kanchan was killed in a gunfight with police.

Name: Munna
Description: On March 10, 2013 Munna was killed in a gunfight with RAB-4 at Savar.

Name: Golam Rabbani
Description: On March 20, 2013 Rabbani was shot dead by police during a clash initiated on the occasion of observing a strike by Jamaat-e-Islami. Jamaat-e-Islami agitated in protest of releasing Amir of the Jamaat-e-Islami of Sylhet city.

Name: Saidul Islam
Description: On March 21, 2013 Saidul Islam was killed in a  gunfight by police.
Follow-up: Name of the victim was updated from Prothom-alo of March 28, 2013
Sources: Manab Zamin / The Daily Star     22.03.2013; Updated  New Age 28.03.2013

Name: Intajul Islam
Description: On March 21, 2013 Intajul Islam was shot dead, when police and the villagers get involved in a clash.

Name: M A Mahfizur Rahman
Identity: Head teacher of Nijam Ibne Dalil High School
Description: On February 22, 2013 he was shot by police. He was under treatment at Sylhet Osmani Medical College Hospital and finally  died on March 22, 2013.

Name: Anisur Rahman
Description: On March 22, 2013 Anisur Rahman was shot dead by police. A police force went there to arrest Anisur Rahman, an accused of a murder case.There the villagers and Jamaat men attacked the police force while police opened fire.

Name: Jhikor
Description: On March 25, 2013 a gunfight took place at  Khilkhet road between  police and drug dealer and Jhikor was killed in Gunfight..

Name: Moni Gaus
Description: A gunfight took place between RAB-11 and a group of robber at Dhaka to Kachuya Hifgway. During the gunfight Moni Gaus was killed.

Name: Belal Hossain
Description: Belal Hossain was shot dead by police at the Aramnagar bazar when BNP activist and AL activists got engaged in a clash.

Name: Waliullah

Name: Mujibur Rahman Mollah
Description: Sheikh Shahidul Islam and Mujibur Rahman Mollah were killed in a crossfie with RAB-8 at Shelarchar, Sundarban.

Name: Selim

Name: Abul Kashem
Description: Abul Kashem was killed in a 'shootout' with the Rapid Action Battalion at a village in Maheshkhali upazila of Cox's Bazar on February 15, 2013.

Name: Abdul Khaliq
Location: Sylhet M A G Osmani Medical College Hospital
Description: Abdul Khaliq was tortured to death by the Detective Branch of Police , alleged by his family. Police arrested him infront of Hotel Samon at Kasttoghor. After his arrest, police took him to the Ibne Sina Hospital. 30 minutes later, police took Abdul Khaliq to the Sylhet M A G Osmani Medical College Hospital. The doctors declared him dead there.

Name: Farid Ahmed
Location: Mahmudpur village, Sirajganj Sadar upazila, Sirajganj
Description: Farid Ahmed was beaten to death by a team of police of Sirajganj led by Sub-Inspectors Abdus Salam and Md Selim. Police raided the home of the victim at around 9 pm and beat him mercilessly, leaving him dead on the spot for not paying them bribe.

Name: Anowar Hossain Mintu
Description: Anowar Hossain was killed in a gunfight with RAB on February 28, 2013.

Name: Mohammad Imran Khan
Identity: A leader of the Chittagong Polytechnic Institute unit of student wing of Jamaat-e-Islami
Description: Three people Imran Khan, Shafiqul Islam and Afzal were killed in Chittagong  in clashes centering on the war crimes trial verdict against Jamaat-e-Islami's Assistant Secretary General Abdul Kader Molla.Later, another dead body of Abid was found after the clashes at Dewanhat  crossing of Dobolmuring Police Station of the city on February 5, 2013.On 14.2.13 Bahadur Hossain (55), a village watchman who sustained injuries during clash on February 6, succumbed to his injuries at Chittagong Medical College Hospital.)
Sources: 6.2.13 New Age, Sangbad 7.2.13 and 15.2.13 Daily Star

Name: Tofayel Uddin
Identity: Jamaat-e-Islami and Student wing of Jamaat-e-Islami
Description: Four Jamaat and student wing of Jamaat activists were shot dead and 30 people including pedestrians sustained bullet injuries in police firing during a fierce clash between Jamaat and student wing of Jamaat members and law enforcers. The Jamaat and student wing of Jamaat activists started pelting stones and brickbats at the law enforcers. The police retaliated by firing rubber bullets at the Jamaat and student wing of Jamaat members. The district administration imposed section 144 in the town until further notice issued.The firing ensued around 2:00 pm when several hundred activists of Jamaat-Shibir brought out processions in Rumaliachhara and Tarabaniachhara areas of the town after Juma prayers demanding release of Sayedee.
Sources: 16.2.13 Jaijaidin and New Age, The Daily Star

Name: Ali Asgar Khan Rahat
Identity: Social Welfare Secretary of Sylhet City Unit of Student wing of Jamaat-e-Islami and also an accounting student of Madan Manhan College
Description: Two persons including an Islami Chhatra Shibir leader, who sustained bullet injuries in separate clashes with police in Sylhet, succumbed to their injuries on February 25, 2013.Rahat sustained injuries when police opened fire on a Shibir procession on February 16.He was flown to the capital the same day for treatment. The Shibir leader died at Apollo Hospital and his body was sent back to Sylhet. Shahin, on the other,was injured on February 22 when police fired gunshots to bring the situation under control after the Sylhet Central Shaheed Minar was damaged by Islamist demonstrators.

Name: Mohammad Ibrahim
Description: Mohammad Ibrahim was shot dead and  in a clash between the police and Jamaat-student wing of Jamaat activists on the Dhaka-Chittagong highway on February 18, 2013 in the countrywide dawn to dusk hartal.

Name: Mostafa Murshed Tahsin
Description: Mostafa Murshed Tahsin was killed and 50 people including journalists and pedestrians as Islamists clashed with the police. Islamists under the banner of 'Touhidi Janata' brought out processions from different mosques after juma prayers demanding punishment of the atheist bloggers for allegedly defaming the Holy Quran and making derogatory comments on the Prophet (SM). They vandalised the Ganajagaran Mancha in front of the local press club and torched a police car. Police opened fire to disperse them.

Name: Alal Hossain
Description: Jamaat-student wing of Jamaat and picketers blockade Pabna-Dhaka highway road and demonstrated im the half day hartal. Police rushed to the spot and charged batons and clash ensued between them. Police fired 150 round bullets and threw 40 round tear shells to disperse them. In this incident Alal Hossain and Sirajul Islam, activists of student wing of Jamaat were shot dead .

Name: Sirajul Islam
Description: Jamaat-student wing of Jamaat and picketers blockade Pabna-Dhaka highway road and demonstrated im the half day hartal. Police rushed to the spot and charged batons and clash ensued between them. Police fired 150 round bullets and threw 40 round tear shells to disperse them. In this incident Alal Hossain and Sirajul Islam, activists of student wing of Jamaat were shot dead .

Name: Shah Alam
Description: Four people and pro-hartal activists were shot dead and 20 people sustained bullet wounds in clash between Islamists and law enforcers. Law enforcers and ruling party men had opened fired 'indiscriminately' on demonstrators demanding punishment of the bloggers whom the Islamists accused of maligning Islam and its Prophet (SM), a charge the bloggers denied. The police fired 269 gun shots and more than 150 rubber bullets in self defense after several hundred villagers attacked with firearms, other lethal weapons and bamboo sticks.
Sources: 25.2.13 Amar Desh, New Age and Daily Star

Name: Robiul Islam
Identity: Allama Sayedee Mukti Parishad, Jamaat-e-Islami-Student wing of Jamaat-e-Islami
Description: 11 people had been killed in police- BGB firing when Jamaat-student wing of Jamaat and Allama Sayedee Mukti Parishad men tried to bring out a procession centring on the International Crimes Tribunal verdict that sentenced Jamaat leader Delwar Hossain Sayedee to death on charges of war crimes he had committed in 1971.

Name: Daimul
Description: In the same incident at Thakurgaon one Daimul was critically injured who died on March 14, 2013 at Rangpur Medical College Hospital.

Name: Dulal
Identity: activist of Student wing of BNP
Description: In the same incident at Thakurgaon one Dulal was critically injured who died on March 5, 2013 at Rangpur Medical College Hospital.

Name: Khokon
Identity: Driver of Pickup van, fish trader and day labourer
Description: Three people including two ordinary people identified as driver of pickup van and fish trader  were killed when they got trapped in clashes between Jamaat-student wing of Jamaat activists with the police and student wing of AL activists in different areas of the district. In this incident 100 people were injured.Later, Critically injured Nur Uddin (18), a day labour who was shot  by police died on March 1, 2013. Ref: Ittefaq 2.3.13
Sources: 1.3.13 Amar Desh and Daily Star and 2.3.13 Ittefaq

Name: Nur Uddin
Identity: Driver of Pickup van, fish trader and day labourer
Description: Three people including two ordinary people identified as driver of pickup van and fish trader  were killed when they got trapped in clashes between Jamaat-student wing of Jamaat activists with the police and student wing of AL activists in different areas of the district. In this incident 100 people were injured.Later, Critically injured Nur Uddin (18), a day labour who was shot  by police died on March 1, 2013. Ref: Ittefaq 2.3.15
Sources: 1.3.13 Amar Desh and Daily Star and 2.3.13 Ittefaq

Name: Mahmudul Hasan
Identity: Jamaat-e-Islami and Student wing of Jamaat-e-Islami
Description: Seven people had been killed and 78 had become injured in police firing.

Name: Mashiur Rahman
Identity: Jamaat-e-Islami and Student wing of Jamaat-e-Islami
Description: Seven people had been killed and 78 had become injured in police firing.

Name: Sadekul Islam
Identity: Jamaat-e-Islami and Student wing of Jamaat-e-Islami
Description: Seven people had been killed and 78 had become injured in police firing.

Name: Ashiqur Rahman
Identity: Jamaat-e-Islami and Student wing of Jamaat-e-Islami
Description: Seven people had been killed and 78 had become injured in police firing.

Name: Shahed Ali
Identity: Jamaat-e-Islami and Student wing of Jamaat-e-Islami
Description: Seven people had been killed and 78 had become injured in police firing.

Name: Rabiul
Identity: Jamaat-e-Islami and Student wing of Jamaat-e-Islami
Description: Seven people had been killed and 78 had become injured in police firing.

Name: Jahangir Alam
Identity: Jamaat-e-Islami and Student wing of Jamaat-e-Islami
Description: Seven people had been killed and 78 had become injured in police firing.

Name: Mohammad Mokter Hossain
Description: Two student wing of Jamaat activists had been killed while 20 others had become injured in police firing at Chandidasgati.

Name: Ruhul Amin
Description: Two student wing of Jamaat activists had been killed while 20 others had become injured in police firing at Chandidasgati.

Name: Faizar Rahman
Description: Faizar Rahman from Nasaratpur,Chirirbandar, a Jamaat activist had been killed in several clashes at Rambihat.He was hit with a bullet in the chest.The Superintendent of police in Dinajpur Debdas Bhattacharya confirmed the death. Student Wing of Jamaat  e Islami set fire to several business establishments and damaged a night coach headed for Dinajpur from Dhaka.

Name: Nasir Uddin
Description: The student wing of Jamaat - Islami  men vandalised at Shibtala in the town. Police backed by anti-hartal activists tried to resist them, but the attackers swooped on them with sticks, brick chips and hand-made bombs. The police opened fire on the attackers, leaving Nasir, a Jamaat activist and student of Nawabganj Alia Madrassa dead.

Name: Sajjad Hossain
Identity: Student and  profession couldn't be known
Description: Sajjad Hossain, a student of the Pekua Islamia Madrassa and  one Abdur Rashid had been killed and 100 people had been injured in clashes between Jamaat men and police

Name: Abdur Rashid
Identity: Student and  profession couldn't be known
Description: Sajjad Hossain, a student of the Pekua Islamia Madrassa and  one Abdur Rashid had been killed and 100 people had been injured in clashes between Jamaat men and police

Name: Mijbah Uddin
Description: Mijbah Uddin, an activist of Jamaat was shot to death by police .

Name: Lokman Hossain
Description: Lokman Hossain was killed in clashes between the police and student wing of Jamaat  Islami.

Name: Sabed Ali
Description: A brick field worker Sabed Ali was caught in a clash between Jamaat and law enforcers.

Name: Miraj
Description: Miiraj had been critically injured in police firing.Later he died on March 01, 2013.

Name: Azgor Ali
Description: A group of people were taking alcohol while members of police led by PSI Monir came there and detained Azgor, Ohidul and Iktar. They beat them heavily as a result Azgor fell sick . He was taken to Chuadanga Sadar Hospital where the doctor declared him dead. On the other hand, family of Azgor Ali alleged that, police demanded 1500 taka as bribe from Azgor Ali .

Name: Malek
Description: Malek  allegerdly died in a gunfight with police on January 13, 2012.

Name: Jiarul Islam
Description: It is reported that a group of 30 to 35 alleged smugglers involved in a clash with BGB members while they try to smuggling a consignment of medicine, cosmetics, warm clothes and drugs. A that time, members of BGB opened fire. As a result, Jiarul injured and later died at hospital.

Name: Haresh Ali
Description: The victim, Haresh Ali (55) was playing cards with four or five others near Hatkoroi Bazar at around 1.00 pm when the two policemen ASI Prodip Kumar and constable Samiul Islam went there. ASI Prodip Kumar kicked Haresh hard, causing his death on the spot, locals said.

Name: Nasir Uddin
Location: Chokoria-Pekua road, Chokoriya upazila, Cox's Bazaar
Description: Nasir died in a gunfight with police. He was an accused under a case of dacoity.

Name: Rafiqul Islam Majumder
Identity: General Secretary of 56 no. ward of Dhaka Metropolitan city of Bangladesh Nationalist Party
Description: The handcuffed body of Rafiqul Islam Majumder was recovered at Kumarkhali upazila in Khustia a few hours after he was allegedly picked up by a group of the Rapid Action Battalion personnel from Sailkupa in Jhenaidah on January 5, 2013.

Name: Zakir Hossain
Description: An alleged pirate, Zakir Hossain was killed in 'crossfire' with the Rapid Action Battalion at Bhedakhali village under Sharankhola upazila of Bagerhat district.

Name: Alamgir Hossain
Description: Alamgir Hossain was allegedly killed in a crossfire with police.

Name: Enamul Haque alias Ena Mandal
Identity: An ultra-left Purba Banglar Communist Party (M-L People's War) leader
Description: An ultra-left Purba Banglar Communist Party (M-L People's War) leader Enamul Haque alias Ena Mandal (35) was killed in 'gunfight' with the police at Mirpur in Kushtia on January 27, 2013.

Name: Enamul Haque
Description: Enamul Haque was allegedly killed in gunfight by police.

Name: Nazir Ahmed Sabuj
Identity: A leader of a robbery gang 'Sabuj Bahini'
Description: The leader of a robbery gang was allegedly killed in gunfight with Rab  men in Kawkhali of Pirojpur .Nazir Ahmed Sabuj (40) of Suktagar village under Razapur upazila in Jhalakathi, was the leader of 'Sabuj Bahini', said Captain Abul Bashar of Barisal Rapid Action Battallion-8.

Name: Akram Ali alias Bhadu
Identity: A regional leader of outlawed New Biplobi Communist Party
Description: Bhadu's wife Eti Khatun alleged that Pangsha police in Rajbari picked her husband up from Pangsha bus stand at night on December 20, 2014.However, Abul Bashar, OC of Pangsha Police Station, denied the allegation. On December 21, 2014 his bullet hit body was found.

Name: Ujjal Sheikh
Description: Ujjal Sheikh was allegedly killed in a gunfight with police in Magura Sadar upazila.Deceased Uzzal Hossain 33, son of Awal Biswas of the upazila's Chandpur village.

Name: Mohammad Roni
Identity: An activist of youth wing of BNP
Description: Mokbul Ahmed, father of the deceased alleged that, Police detained Roni from Contractor bridge area on December 8, 2014. Later on night he was shot dead by police beside Mostafa's shop at Latifpur. On the other hand, police claimed that Roni died in gunfight.

Name: Abul Kashem
Description: Abul Kashem was allegedly killed in gunfight with Rab members at Suterkhali in the district's Dakop upazila on December 26, 2014. Acting on a tip-off, a special team of RAB-6, led by Commanding Officer Lt Col Enamul Arif Sumon, raided an area near Suterkhali Forest Station around 9:45 p.m., said media officer of the battalion Harunur Rashid, who is a Senior Assistant Superintendent of Police.Kashem along with his aides was holding a secret meeting there.Sensing the presence RAB personnel, the alleged criminals opened fire, triggering a "gun battle" between the members of the gang and the elite force, the Rab official said.After half an hour of the "gunfight", Kashem was found dead. However, his cohorts managed to escape, he added.

Name: Jahangir Hossain
Description: Jahangir Hossain was allegedly killed in gunfight by police on December 24, 2014.

Name: Azad
Description: Azad was allegedly killed in a gunfight by the police. Police said the "gunfight" in Comilla took place around 5.00 a.m. after a Detective Branch of police team challenged a gang, which was preparing for carjacking, near Alekhar Char area in Sadar upazila on Dhaka-Chittagong highway.Sensing danger, the gang opened fire targeting the DB personnel. prompting them to retaliate that eventually triggered the shootout, said Khorshed Alam, Officer-in-Charge of Kotwali Police Station. Azad was shot and died later.

Name: Mohammad Iqbal Hossain Bhuiyan
Identity: Activist of voluntary wing of Awami League
Description: Iqbal Hossain Bhuiyan was tortured to death. Police arrested him from Protapganj bazaar at around 5.30 p.m. on December 25, 2014. On that day at around 8.00 p.m. he died at Bancharampur Health Complex. Family alleged that he died due to  torture.

Name: Mohammad Roni
Description: An activist of 'Jisan Group' was killed in a 'gunfight' with police at Lakshmipur sadar on December 5, 2014 night. He was identified as Md. Roni (30), son of Mokbul Ahmed, of village Latifpur of Sadar upazila. Police and locals said three policemen were injured during an hour-long gunfight that took place on December 5, 2014 night at village Latifpur.

Name: Rabbi
Description: Rabbi and Jonny, accused of snatching a pistol from a policeman after shooting him, were killed in a police 'shootout' at Alekharchar in Comilla

Name: Musharraf Hossain
Description: A man was killed in 'gunfight' while in the custody of RAB few hours after his arrest at Sandwip upazila in Chittagong

Name: Emdadul Hawlader
Description: Two alleged robbers were killed in a "shoot-out" with RAB in Chandpai range of the Sundarbans in Bagerhat November 11, 2014. The dead are Emdadul Hawlader (34) and Saiful (24)

Name: Hafizur Rahman
Description: Family alleged that, Police arrested him from his house on November 13, 2014. Later he was taken a nearby nursary potti where he was shot in leg. He was injured and admitted into hospital. Later he died on November 22, 2014.

Name: Monir Mia
Description: Monir Mia (35), an alleged leader of a robbery gang was killed in a gunfight with police at South Rumaliachhora in  Cox's Bazar

Name: Karimul
Description: Karimul and Habi, two alleged robbers were killed in a gunfight at Hangarkhana canal near the river Shibsha.

Name: Habibur Rahman alias Habi
Description: Karimul and Habi, two alleged robbers were killed in a gunfight at Hangarkhana canal near the river Shibsha.

Name: Sabur Morol
Location: Phultala village near the Sundarbans under Kayra upazila in Khulna
Description: They were killed in ' gunfight' with police . It is to be noted they were under custody of police

Name: Hanif Gazi
Location: Phultala village near the Sundarbans under Kayra upazila in Khulna
Description: They were killed in ' gunfight' with police . It is to be noted they were under custody of police

Name: Alam Molla
Location: Phultala village near the Sundarbans under Kayra upazila in Khulna
Description: They were killed in ' gunfight' with police . It is to be noted they were under custody of police

Name: Amirul Sheikh
Location: Phultala village near the Sundarbans under Kayra upazila in Khulna
Description: They were killed in ' gunfight' with police . It is to be noted they were under custody of police

Name: Afzal Sheikh
Location: Phultala village near the Sundarbans under Kayra upazila in Khulna
Description: They were killed in ' gunfight' with police . It is to be noted they were under custody of police

Name: Mahbub Molla
Location: Phultala village near the Sundarbans under Kayra upazila in Khulna
Description: They were killed in ' gunfight' with police . It is to be noted they were under custody of police

Name: Mofizullah Molla
Location: Phultala village near the Sundarbans under Kayra upazila in Khulna
Description: They were killed in ' gunfight' with police . It is to be noted they were under custody of police

Name: Shafiqul Sheikh
Location: Phultala village near the Sundarbans under Kayra upazila in Khulna
Description: They were killed in ' gunfight' with police . It is to be noted they were under custody of police

Name: Nazrul Sheikh
Location: Phultala village near the Sundarbans under Kayra upazila in Khulna
Description: They were killed in ' gunfight' with police . It is to be noted they were under custody of police

Name: Rubel Sheikh
Location: Phultala village near the Sundarbans under Kayra upazila in Khulna
Description: They were killed in ' gunfight' with police . It is to be noted they were under custody of police

Name: Joydev Khan
Location: Phultala village near the Sundarbans under Kayra upazila in Khulna
Description: They were killed in ' gunfight' with police . It is to be noted they were under custody of police

Name: Raju
Location: Mrigamari area of Chandpai range under Mongla upazila in Bagerhat
Description: Two people said to be members of Awal Bhahini prowling Sundarban were killed in a gunfight with the members of Rapid Action Battallion-8 at Mrigamari area of Chandpai range under Mongla upazila in Bagerhat.

Name: Zakir
Location: Mrigamari area of Chandpai range under Mongla upazila in Bagerhat
Description: Two people said to be members of Awal Bhahini prowling Sundarban were killed in a gunfight with the members of Rapid Action Battallion-8 at Mrigamari area of Chandpai range under Mongla upazila in Bagerhat.

Name: Abdul Hadi
Location: Phulbari Gate area, kaliganj upazila, Jhenaidah
Description: The alleged criminals were picked up by Jessore police around  on October 13, 2014 night, father of a victim claimed. Police, however, refuted the claim and said the two might have been killed by rival groups due to internal feud.  Shohag's father Rakibul Islam, a commander of Bangladesh Ansar, said that his son along with Hadi and few others were sitting at a tea stall near their house. A team of DB police accompanied by SI Masud Hossain of Khajura Police Outpost of Jessore Sadar Police Station reached the spot around 11.30 pm and detained them along with two others-Mohsin Ali (17) and Opu Hossain (16) said Rakibul. DB stopped at Panchbera Bahadur bus stand and freed Mohsin and Opu, he said, adding that he heard the news of his sons detention on that night from other people sitting at the tea stall. Police gave Mohsin and Opu Tk 200 each as bus fare before freeing them and told them that they were taking Hadi and Shohag to the police station, Rakibul claimed. Next morning, Rakibul came to know that dead bodies of his son and Hadi were found in Jhenaidah. He demanded a proper investigation into the incident to unmask the real culprits.

Name: Abul Hashem
Description: On October 14, 2014 at around 1.30 am police shot the fisherman while he was fishing in the Mehgna River, alleged by his family. However, police denied the allegation.

Name: Babul Mollah
Identity: An alleged mugger/leader of Purbo Banglar Communist Party
Description: An alleged mugger was killed in a so-called gunfight with police in Terokhada upazila on October 15, 2014. The dead is Babul Mollah. Sensing their presence, the criminals opened fire on the law enforcers. In retaliation, police fired back and Babul Mollah, while trying to flee the scene, was caught in the line of fire and died on the spot. The deceased was a regional leader of Purbo Banglar Communist party.

Name: Osman Dafader
Description: Osman was killed in a gunfight between alleged criminals and police personel. On September 13, 2014 police arrested him. Following his statement, the police went to conduct drive for recovering illegal arms. During this time,alleged criminals opened fire to police. Police retaliated fire-back, leaving Osman spot dead.

Name: Mejbah Uddin Tarek
Description: DB police arrested Mejbah on September 13, 2014 at around 3.00 am. Later,police took him for recovering arms at Mugda area where there a gunfight ensued with Mejbah's associates. At one stage of gunfight, Mejbah was bullet wounded. Then he was taken to Dhaka Medical College Hospital where he the doctors declared him dead.

Name: Shah Alam Khondorar
Description: The deceased's wife Mariyum Begum alleged that 15 to 20 people stormed their house at Bijaynagar of Barudi under Sonargaon upazila in Narayanganj around 10.00 am on September 15, 2014 and dragged Shah Alam into their boat introducing them as Detective Branch of Police. Police said, Shah Alam was killed during a gunfight with the DB police at the Wireless Gate of Mogbazar when he along with his cohorts attacked on police.

Name: Motiar Rahman alias Mamun
Description: A police petrol team, acting on a tip-off, went to Patbila area where a gang of robbers was taking preperation for looting night coaches by felling roadside trees. Sensing the presence of policemen, the gang opened fire, prompting the law enforcers to retaliate. During the gunfight Motiar received bullet injuries while remaining gang members managed to flee. Motiar was taken to Jhenidah Sadar Hospital where the doctors declared him dead.

Name: Sekendar Sarder
Description: Police arrested Sekendar on September 17, 2014 at around 3.00 am. Later, police took him for recovering arms at Mathavanga area where there a gunfight ensued with Sekendar's associates. At one stage of gunfight, Sekendar was killed .

Name: Babul Miah
Identity: Supporter of Chairman candidate Hamidul Haq
Description: A clash took place between supporters of chairman candidate Hamidul Haq and Shah Alam to control polling center and giving fake vote. At one stage police fired 50 rubber bullets and tear shells to bring the situation under control. This left many people wounded including Babul Miah. Babul Miah was taken to Akhaura Shastho complex where the doctors declared him dead.

Name: Yusuf Ali
Description: On September 9, 2014 a youth named Yusuf Ali, son of Ibrahim and inhabitant of Jhapaipara village under Chapainababganj Municipality area, died in the custody of Chapainababganj Police Station. The mother of the deceased, Amena Begum informed that Yusuf died due to torture by police after he was arrested. Sub Inspector (SI) Monirul Islam of Chapainababganj Police Station led this operation. She was informed by local people of the area from where Yusuf was arrested that police beat him after his arrest. Police took him on van at one stage when Yusufs mouth was bleeding. He was beaten again by police even after taking into van. Due to severe beating Yusuf became seriously ill and on September 9, he died in Chapainababganj Sadar Hospital. She claimed that there were marks of injuries on Yusufs body. The grandfather of Yusuf, Ahad Munshi informed that police beat Yusuf soon after he was arrested. He was taken to hospital by police with bleeding. Police did not allow them to see Yusufs body before the body was officially handed over to the family. Eye-witness of the incident, Mirza Ronju said that on September 12, at midnight, he was picked up in police station by SI Monirul Islam for disclosing the matter in media. But he was released in the next morning as the incident of his arrest exposed. He also said that SI Monirul Islam is threatening him along with his family to put in jail by implicating in case for telling truth. They could not live at home in fear.
Sources: Report sent by human right defender  from Chapainababganj

Name: Monirul Islam
Identity: A regional leader of outlawed Purba Banglar Communist Party (Janajuddho)
Description: Monirul Islam (32) ,a regional leader of outlawed Purba Banglar Communist Party (PBCP) was killed in a "gunfight" with police at Dhopakhola under Phultala upazila .

Name: Rajib Hossain alias Rajib
Description: Rajib was killed in a gunfight with DB police at Hatirjheell of Magbazar rail crossing, Dhaka on August 7, 2014. Rajib's family, however, claimed that the DB arrested him two days ago from Rampura and that the killing was pre-planned.
Sources: Prothom Alo and The Daily Star 08.08.2014

Name: Moktarul Dhali alias Mokter
Description: Moktarul Dhali alias Mokter  was allegedly killed in a gunfight with police .

Name: Nasir alias Russell
Description: RAB killed Nasir alias Russell (29) alleged forest robber in 'crossfire' in Sunderban in Bagerhat.

Name: Abdul Jalil alias
Identity: A leader of the outlawed Sarbahara Party
Description: A leader of the outlawed Sarbahara party was killed on August 21, 2014 at Shilundia Bazaar of Babuganj upazila in Barisal in a 'shootout' with the Rapid Action Battalion..Captain Abul Bashar, Commander of company-1 at the Barisal headquarters of Rab-8, said a Rab team led by Deputy Assistant Director Abdur Rahman was patrolling Silundia area around 4.20 pm when they marked a suspicious gathering.When challenged, the suspects opened fire on the Rab men, he said.The Rab team fired back.

Name: Khorshed Alam alias Khuisha
Description: Police arrested Khorshed on August 26, 2014. Later, took him for recovering arms at Panchgaon union where there a gunfight ensued on August 28, 2014. He was killed in a cross fire.

Name: Timir Baran Chakma
Identity: Leader of Parbatta Jonoshonghoti Samity (MN Larma)
Description: Timir Baran Chakma alias Duranto Chakma Babu (52) died during medical treatment while under the custody of Army in Matiranga Hospital. On August 9 in the evening, members of the Army carried out an operation in Indumoni area under Guiyamara Upazila in Khagrachhari Hill District and arrested Duranto Chakma Babu (52), Nishimoni Chakma (40), Amarkanti Chakma (18) and Romel Tripura (38) in the morning of August 10. Sudhakar Tripura, Student & Youth Affairs Secretary of the Central Committee of Parbatta Gonoshonghoti Samity (MN Larma) alleged that Duranta Chakma died due to torture. Meanwhile army stated regarding his death that Duranta Chakma was suddenly fall sick due to asthma and he was admitted to Matiranga Hospital where he died.  Elena Chakma, the wife of Nishumoni Chakma, said, the Army surrounded their house at night and arrested them at around 5.30 am, and after making the arrest all of them were severely beaten and kicked by Army with their boots. Duranta Chakmas wife Alotara Chakma said that her husband had no disease in relation to asthma.

Name: Zakir Hossain
Description: A man was killed by the DB police allegedly in crossfire at Khilgaon in Dhaka . The deceased, Zakir Hossain (40) had been running a tea stall, the family said, while the police claimed that he was known as Kangali Zakir and was facing different criminal charges including murder of sergent Ahad.

Name: Mahbubur Rahman Sujon
Description: A youth died in police custody at the Mirpur police station on July 13, 2014, hours after he was detained by police. Family members of the victim alleged he was tortured to death. The deceased, Mahbubur Rahman Sujon (35) was accused in several cases, said Dhaka Metropolitan Police Deputy Commissioner (media and public relation) Masudur Rahman.Meanwhile, a sub inspector of Mirpur police, Jahidur Rahman, was closed in connection with this incident.Sujon was admitted to a local clinic and then shifted to the Suhrawardy Hospital at Sher-e-Bangla Nagar after he suffered respiratory problems, around 4.00 am, where doctors declared him dead, said Mirpur division deputy commissioner Imtiaz Ahmed. The body was sent to the Dhaka Medical College and Hospital mortuary for postmortem. Mirpur police station officer-in-charge  Salahuddin said Sujon was a listed criminal and member of criminal gang Shahadat Bahini.However, the deceased's brother Shameem said Sujon was an apparel products trader and was not involved in any criminal activities.He said that a sub-inspector, Jahid was demanding extortion from Sujon and threatened to kill him unless he paid the money.' Police stormed into Sujon's Sankar residence at night and took him. Moreover, he did not have any respiratory problems.Police tortured him to death', said Shameem.DMHC morgue officials also said Sujon had several marks of injury on his body.

Name: Abdur Rashid
Identity: Two operatives of outlawed Purba Bangla Communist Party (ML)
Description: Two members of the Purba Bangla Communist Party (ML) were killed by the police in two alleged incidents of gunfight in Jhenaidah. The Kotchandpur police station officer-in-charge, Fazlur Rahman, said that Abdur Rashid was found dead following a 'gunfight' with the police on July 12, 2014 night at Dora as the police conducted an operation to arrest crime suspects. On the other hand,  Harinakunda police station officer-in-charge , Ershadul Kabir, said that Hazrat Ali was found dead in another 'gunfight' with the police on July 12, 2014 as the police conducted another operation in Rishkhali Amtala to arrest robbers. 'As the police reached the spot, the robbers fired at the police, who 'retaliate', he said.

Name: Siraj Akunji
Identity: An activist of Biplabi Communist Party
Description: Local people alleged that Siraj Akunji, an activist of Biplabi Communist Party killed in a gunfight on July 16, 2014. However police claimed that the victim was an activist of underground Biplabi Communist Party and was killed in a factional clash of the party.

Name: Giasuddin Apan
Description: Prime suspect in abduction and rape of a Cambrian College girl at Uttara in Dhaka was killed by the Detective Branch of police in a reported incident of 'crossfire' at Hatirjheel on July 18, 2014.The police said that the deceased, Giasuddin Apan (27) was a member of a mugging ring and prime suspect in abduction and rape of the college girl after killing a security guard at Uttara on July 3, 2014. The DMP Deputy Commissioner (media and public relations), Masudur Rahman, said that a gunfight took place between the police and miscreants at about 4.00 am in Hatirjheel area where Giasuddin was found injured.Badda police sub-inspector Jayantu Kumar Mandal said that they recovered the bullet-hit Giasuddin and sent to DMCH where doctors declared him dead.

Name: SM Biplab Kabir
Identity: Tala upazila BNP joint secretary/ a lecturer of mathematics of Shalika Degree College
Description: A local leader of the Bangladesh Nationalist Party was killed by the police in a reported incident of 'shootout' at Tala upazila in Satkhira on July 18, 2014. The deceased, Tala upazila BNP joint secretary SM Biplab Kabir, was also a lecturer of mathematics of Shalika Degree College.The acting BNP secretary general, Mirza Fakhrul Islam Alamgir, condemned the killing saying that Biplab was killed in police shooting and he was also beaten up by local Awami League activists.

Name: Anisur Rahman
Description: Anisur Rahman killed in a  gunfight allegedly by police at Bosotpur, Sarsha, Jessore on July 19, 2014.

Name: Namir Talukdar
Description: An alleged robber was killed in a "shootout" with police in the east Sundarbans under Sharankhola range of Bagerhat on July 20, 2014. The dead, Namir Talukdar (38) was a member of robber gang, Rezaul alias 'Shirsha Bahini', according to police.

Name: Anwar Hossain Jasim
Identity: Member of Pashchim Nodimpur ward of Noajishpur union of Raujan
Description: On July 21, 2014 in the dawn unknown persons called two brothers Anwar and Gias Uddin over mobile phone to come in a place. Later Anwar was found dead with bullet hit. It was alleged by the members of RAB, as Giasuddin, younger brother of the deceased Anwar was shown arrested by RAB .

Name: Nur Islam Ulka
Description: In Tangail,  Nur Islam Ulka (26) and Shahed Miah (27) were allegedly killed in a gunfight with police who were accused in the case filed for murdering assistant sub-inspector Nurul Islam of Tangail Model Police Station.Mohammad Akhtaruzzaman, officer-in-charge of the police station, said police raided a house in Takia Kodma village of Mirzapur upazila at around 4:00am on July 28, 2014 to arrest Ulka and his accomplices.Sensing their presence, Ulka and his accomplices opened fire, prompting the policemen to retaliate.Ulka was killed on the spot while his cohorts Sagar alias Dollar and Shahed sustained bullets wounds and were rushed to Mirzapur Kumudini Hospital. Later that day, they were shifted to Tangail General Hospital.The next day, they were taken to Dhaka Medical College Hospital (DMCH) as their conditions worsened. There, Shahed succumbed to his injuries.

Name: Monirul Islam
Description: Monirul Islam (35) was killed in a "gunfight" with police in Jhenidah's Shailkupa on July 28, 2014.Iqbal Bahar Chowdhury, OC of Shailkupa Police Station, said they got a tip-off that a gang of criminals had gathered at Kanapukurai village. When they raided the village around 3:00am, the "criminals" started firing bullets at the law enforcers, triggering a gunfight.After the gunfight was over, police recovered Monirul's body.

Name: Alamgir Hossain
Description: In Rangpur, an alleged robber was killed in a "gunfight" with police on Dhaka-Rangpur highway at Phulbari of Mithapukur upazila on July 30, 2014. Alamgir Hossain 40, was a ringleader of Alamgir Bahini and son of Javed Ali of Khamarpara Phulchouki village in the upazila.Acting on secret information that a gang of criminals were preparing to commit robbery in Bhelur Bridge area of the village, a team of police went to the spot around 11:00pm, said Rabiul Alam, officer-in-charge of Mithapukur Police Station.Seeing the law enforcers, the "robbers" opened fire, prompting police to retaliate. Alamgir was caught in the line of fire and died on the spot, according to police.

Name: Johur Ahmed
Description: Johur Ahmed was dead allegedly by Ansar at Bholaganj, Companyganj Upazila, Sylhet while a group of stone lifter trying to theft stone from a restricted area of Railway area. Members of Ansar claimed that they opened fire in self defence.

Name: Bhutto
Description: Bhuttu was shot in a gunfight with police on May  26, 2014. Later he was succumed to his injuries in  hospital on June 2, 2014. His wife claimed that police killed him in a planned way.

Name: Ismail Hossain alias Khokon
Identity: Activist of youth wing of Awami League
Location: Katakhali area, Digholi union, Sadar upazila, Lokkhipur
Description: Khokon was  killed in a gunfight allegedly by police at Katakhali area, Digholi union, Sadar upazila, Lokkhipur.Family alleged that police picked up him in the night.
Sources: Amar Desh,Amader Shomoy and Prothom Alo 04.06.2014

Name: Shaheen Mollah
Description: Shaheen Mollah was allegedly tortured by police at Dasar Police Station, Kalkini, Madaripur. On June 8, 2014 at around 8.30 pm SI Nazmul Hasan arrested Shaheen and his friends Mukit and Shah Alam from Naiarbari Bridge at Medakul of Gournadi. Shaheen's maternal aunt Selima Begum alleged that after taking those detainees into the police station he sent Nazrul Islam, source of police to their guardians. After receiving the news from the source those guardians went police station. There SI Nazmul demanded 75,000 Taka to release those three people. At night Mukit and Shah Alam's family gave the money to the officer. However, Shaheen's family was unable to pay the amount. So, police had shown him arrested in a narcotic case and presented him infront of the court. Later he was sent to jail. Shaheen was tortured in the police custody. Later on June 14, 2014 he died at Madaripur Sadar Hospital.
Sources: Prothom Alo 16.06.2014 and Shaheen's maternal aunt Selima Begum, cell phone number-01772879657

Name: Morol Islam
Description: An alleged robber was killed in "gunfight" with police. The deceased is Morol Islam (45). According to Inamul Haque, Officer-in-Charge of Satkhira Sadar Police Station, on information that a gang of 16-17 robbers were preparing to rob a passenger bus in Chhoyghoria on the Satkhira-Jessore  road, a police team went to the area around 3.45 a.m. on June 14, 2014.Sensing the law enforcers' presence, the robbers hurled bombs and opened fire on them, prompting police to retaliate, Haque added.Morol sustained bullets during the gunfight and fell on the ground while his cohorts managed to flee.Police took Morol to Satkhira Sadar Hospital where the duty doctors declared him dead.

Name: Abul Bashar
Location: Jogikhal area of Begumgonj upazila, Noakhali
Description: Abul Bashar, an alleged criminal and the chief of Bashar Bahini, was killed in a "gunfight" with the police at Jogikhal area of Begumgonj upazila in Noakhali on June 14, 2014. Police arrested Bashar on June 13, 2014, morning, said S M Ashrafuzzaman,Acting Superintendent of police in Noakhali.According to police, based on his information, police went to Jogikhal with him to recover arms. When they reached the spot, associates of Bashar opened fire on the police in an attempt to snatch away Bashar was caught in the line of fire and died on the spot, he said.

Name: Jahirul Islam
Description: Jahirul Islam was detained by the members of BGB on June 14, 2014. At that time they had beaten him. BGB members then produced him in front of mobile Court. There he was sentenced to one year and eight months simple imprisonment. Later, he was sent to Jail in the afternoon. In the midnight he fell sick. The jail authority took him into hospital where doctor declared him dead.

Name: Ferdous Islam alias Litu
Identity: A member of Purba Bangla Communist Party (ML)
Description: Ferdous Islam alias Litu was killed in a gunfight allegedly by police. Police said, he was arrested at around 7.45 pm on June 27, 2014 from Thukra village, Raghunathpur union. Then in the midnight at around 1.45 am on June 28, 2014 police took him outside to recover arms at Thukra Bazaar area. Later, his accomplice opened fire to rescue Ferdous. Police also retaliated. In this incident, Ferdous was killed..

Name: Md Rokonuzzaman
